package array;

public class ArrayDi3 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int[][] arr = {
                {1, 2, 3}, // 0í–‰
                {4, 5, 6}, // 1í–‰
        };

        for (int row = 0; row < arr.length; row++) {
            for (int col = 0; col < arr[row].length; col++) {

            }
            System.out.println();
        }
    }
}
